37 int MAX_ROBOTS;
38 int NUM_ROBOTS; // total number of playing robots in the team including self
39 int NUM_SENSORS_PER_ROBOT; // SENSORS include odometry, each feature sensor like
40 // a ball detector, each landmark-set detector and so
41 // on. In this case for example the number of sensors
42 // are 3, 1-odometry, 1-orange ball, 1-landmarkset.
43 // Usually this must co-incide with the number of
44 // topics to which each robot is publishing its
45 // sensed information.
46 int NUM_TARGETS; // Number of targets being tracked. In omni dataset, only one
47 // target exists for now: the orange ball. This may be improved
48 // in future by adding the blue ball which can be seen the raw
49 // footage of the dataset experiment
50 std::vector<bool> PLAYING_ROBOTS; // indicate which robot(s) is(are) playing
51 
52 // Empirically obtained coefficients in the covariance expression. See (add
53 // publications here)
54 
55 // coefficients for landmark observation covariance
56 float K1, K2;
57 
58 // coefficients for target observation covariance
59 float K3, K4, K5;
60 
61 float ROB_HT; // Fixed height of the robots above ground in meters
62 int MY_ID; // Use this flag to set the ID of the robot expected to run a certain
63 // decentralized algorithm. Robot with MY_ID will be trated as the
64 // self robot running the algorithm while the rest will be considered
65 // teammates. Note that in the dataset there are 4 robots with IDs
66 // 1,3,4 and 5. Robot with ID=2 is not present.
67 
68 // Initial 2D positons of the robot as obtained from the overhead ground truth
69 // system. The order is OMNI1 OMNI2 OMNI3 OMNI4 and OMNI5. Notice OMNI2 is
70 // initialized as 0,0 because the robot is absent from the dataset.
71 // This initialization will work only if the node startes befoe the rosbag of
72 // the dataset. Obviously, the initialization below is for the initial positions
73 // at the begginning of the dataset. Otherwise, the initialization makes the
74 // odometry-only trajecory frame transformed to the origin.
75 std::vector<double> POS_INIT;
76 
77 int nParticles_;
78 
79 // for ease of access
80 std::vector<pfuclt_aux::Landmark> landmarks;
81

83 typedef boost::random::mt19937 RNGType;

127 class Robot

136  Eigen::Isometry2d prevPose_;

138  ros::Time curTime_;
139  ros::Time prevTime_;
140  particles_t& pfParticles_;
141 
142 public:
143  Robot(ros::NodeHandle& nh, ReadRobotMessages* parent,
144  Eigen::Isometry2d initPose, particles_t& pfParticles, uint robotNumber)
145  : nh_(nh), parent_(parent), initPose_(initPose), curPose_(initPose),
146  pfParticles_(pfParticles), started_(false), robotNumber_(robotNumber)
147  {
148  // nothing, only initialize members above
149  }
150  bool isStarted() { return started_; }
151  void setStarted(bool value) { started_ = value; }
152 };
